channel.title: 667.728 Lamps
channel.description: well on the zenith client im using some skills dont work, soo i was wondering if any of you knew how to make it so if someone clicks huge lamp (slayer) it gives you 99 slayer

item.title: 667.728 Lamps
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

In your item method, where your items are being handled, add something like:

If(ItemID == lamp){ giveXP(###); }
This code won’t work because it’s not correct and it’s based of the 317 revision. You will need to write it on your own but this will give you an idea. I hope you will learn something while you’re trying to implent it.

Read full topic
